parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description: The ID of the Prometheus instance.

parameters.name: ConfigYaml
parameters.description: The monitoring configuration. Specify a YAML string.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description: The status of the monitoring configuration. Valid values: run and stop. Default value: run. This parameter is not available if the Type parameter is set to Probe.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description:
The type of the monitoring configuration. 
Valid values for a Prometheus instance for Container Service: serviceMonitor, podMonitor, customJob, and probe. 
Valid values for a Prometheus instance for ECS: customJob and probe.
